abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column notes that churches are now taking steps to show their love for animals by sponsoring groups for pet lovers.
snippet: In a culture obsessed with dogs, dog whisperers and domestic pets of all kinds, religious groups are paying attention, too, with many megachurches sponsoring groups for pet lovers.
